modName: Delux ArchMage Quarters plus Mages Kitchen
summary: As the title suggests this is an add on to my previous mod Mages Kitchen and makes the ArchMage Quarters more luxurious.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#00ffff][size=6]Kursan presents: Delux ArchMage Quarters plus Mages Kitchen
                                 
                                     [img]http://i.imgur.com/VFlvwAI.png[/img]
[/size]
[/color][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#1e84cc][size=3]The ArchMages Quarters at the College of Winterhold always felt very cold and unwelcoming to me.
There are already other mods that change them quite a bit, this is my interpretation of a more luxurious suite for the head of an illustrious order without going overboard.[/size][/color][/font]

[color=#ff00ff]Changelog: New in V-1.3
Added two Mannequins by request to the entry lobby.
Added ample Ingredient storage directly to the Alchemy lab.
Added storage for Soul gems and enchanted gear by the Enchanter table.
Added two wall mounted weapon plaques for shield and two weapons each.
Added some decor and moved stuff around.
Removed more unnecessary clutter.
The new bed has no ownership so you can sleep in it even before becoming Archmage.

The following features are still the same from the original version:
Two fire places, one for cooking and one for decor and heat by the bed.
Changed the bed location and to a different style.
Added 3 library type Bookcases filling a niche, one is empty, plus one open bookshelf near the bed.
Added 9 standing weapon racks perfect for staffs.
Added an ornate bathtub with heat source.
Added some drapes and wall decorations and many floor rugs and skins.
Added one more small display case for balance.
Moved existing furnishings around to fit in better and removed some unnecessary clutter.
[/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]
This Mod includes my previous mod "Mages Kitchen" which adds a full kitchen to the hall of Attainment. You can get the kitchen by itself on its own page here:[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30570/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30570/?[/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=3]I Hope you will like this mod and endorse it. The Bathtub is particularly useful if you use both Frostfall by Chesko and "Drink Eat Sleep and Bathe" by RyanB, that way you can actually clean up in the tub and also get warmed up; particularly useful in that region:)
If you are using a mod that changes the water textures be sure to load this after it so that the water in the tub is recognized by "Drink Eat Sleep and Bathe" for the bathing function to work and that mod needs to load after a water texture mod also.

The mod has been cleaned with TES5Edit, but always make a backup save before trying a new mod, this one is no different and I am not liable for any issues you may have after trying out this mod.
I like to thank Bethesda for a truly one of a kind game.
Special credit goes to Eldiabs for his Modders Resource pack.

Installation:

Best to use the NMM button and activate in your load order; or for manual installation just drop the esp file into your Skyrim Data folder and make sure its box is ticked in your Load order menu.[/size][/color]
author: Kursan
